messages.message: Building an App on build for a partner. I think a required feature at least for enterprise is a tool to benchmark prompt for an attribute across a list of documents with golden. Something where you could write multiple prompts for the same attribute and directly see a % accuracy across 10 or 30 documents by prompts. "Prompt Studio" cc @Lee @joshbronko

We’ve spoken a bit about adding something similar to a ‘targets’ feature like we have in Refiner but in AI Hub build. I agree being able to provide the correct answers to AI Hub and then being able to iterate on your prompts until you get a higher score would be useful.
@Léo would you mind opening a Task ticket on the EPD board in Jira for this please? If you could provide any context that would be useful, we can then contribute to that over time.

@hannah for light weight solution accuracy. We have a ticket tracking this:

https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1207
Thanks @Léo and@Eric Han! We'll be looking into this in just a few weeks and may reach out with more questions/feedback when we get started on defining the feature.
